full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Desktop Training Simulator for Small Watercraft
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for a Desktop Training Simulator (DTS) for small craft.  The winning contractor must provide 1-2 desktop-style, marine small craft training simulators equipped with virtual reality technology, to be utilized by the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) in the Arctic Region.

#### Description of the Project
This project involves the provision and installation of a desktop training simulator, equipped with virtual reality technology, inside a recreational vehicle-style, mobile classroom.  The contractor must deliver an instructor training and equipment familiarization course for a minimum of two personnel, up to ten, to ensure successful operation and utilization of the training simulator.

#### Important Dates

* The deadline to submit proposals is 2023-03-29, at 14:00 Eastern Time (ET).
* The contract is expected to commence on 2023-03-30 and is anticipated to end on 2028-03-29.

#### Important Details
This project falls under the category of General Defense (GD).  The procurement method employed is Competitive - Open bidding.  Variations or combinations of the above methods will be used to evaluate proposals.  Note that all supporting documentation must be submitted on 2023-03-29 by 14:00 ET.  Proposals received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Allison Fernandez of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at the following:
allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or (365) 340-5724.
